## Load Packages

```{r}
#| output: false
if (!require(librarian)){
  install.packages("librarian")
  library(librarian)
}

librarian::shelf(tidyverse, RPostgres, DBI, here, lubridate, stringr)

```

## read in raw data
```{r}
files <- list.files(here("raw_data"))

for (i in 1:length(files)) {
  
  assign(files[i], read_csv(here("raw_data", files[i])))
  
}


```
